Question: This person is an avid kite-flyer, but his kites keep landing in a "Kite-Eating Tree" or suffering even worse fates.
Hints: Rerun does not reveal whether this person kicks the ball or not.
Later references continue to peg this person as being approximately eight years old.
Initially **** doted on his baby sister, though she too became a thorn in his side as she grew up.
